is_related_to_database = False

Hello! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions related to a database, feel free to ask!
what is your purpose, my liege?

is_related_to_database = False

My purpose is to assist you with queries related to databases, particularly by converting your natural language questions into PostgreSQL queries. If you have any database-related inquiries, please let me know!
what is the meaning of liege

is_related_to_database = False

The term "liege" typically refers to a feudal lord or a person to whom allegiance and service are owed. It can also denote a relationship of loyalty and service between a vassal and a lord in a feudal system. If you have any questions related to databases, feel free to ask!
give me sum of all prices

is_related_to_database = True

Here is the PostgreSQL query to get the sum of all prices from the inventory table:

```sql
SELECT SUM(unit_price) AS total_price FROM inventory;
```

is_related_to_database = False

Main theek hoon, shukriya! Aap kaise hain? Agar aapko kisi database se related madad chahiye, toh zaroor batayein!
bhai ye saare prices ke sum ka bataiyo?

is_related_to_database = True

Yeh raha PostgreSQL query jo inventory table se saare prices ka sum nikaalne ke liye hai:

```sql
SELECT SUM(unit_price) AS total_price FROM inventory;
```

is_related_to_database = False

Aapki pichli query thi "bhai ye saare prices ke sum ka bataiyo?" Agar aapko aur koi madad chahiye ya koi aur query hai, toh zaroor batayein!
aur tera answer kya tha meri pichli query pr?

is_related_to_database = False

Meri pichli response mein maine aapko PostgreSQL query di thi jo inventory table se saare prices ka sum nikaalne ke liye thi. Yahan woh query hai:

```sql
SELECT SUM(unit_price) AS total_price FROM inventory;
```

Agar aapko aur koi madad chahiye, toh zaroor batayein!

is_related_to_database = False

I was responding in Hindi. If you prefer to communicate in English or any other language, please let me know! How can I assist you today?
